roleset.name: To saturate in alcohol, or convert to alcohol

role.descr: Resulting state after conversion, attribute of arg1

roleset.note: Roleset added in parallel expansion of VerbNet, PropBank, and sense groupings. Framed by Claire

example.name: Science jargon
example.text: [Polyvinyl acetate]-1 was alcoholized *-1 to such an extent that 88% of the acetate groups were removed.
example.note: Only passive, descriptive usages could be found.
example.arg: to such an extent that 88% of the acetate groups were removed
